title: £169m jackpot must be won tonight
text:
Tonight's Euromillions draw has a whopping £169million up for grabs. The rules state the jackpot cannot exceed €190 million - and we're at that point now.

BREAKING: Euromillions: UK player wins massive £169m jackpot after matching all winning numbers

Excitement levels were through the roof last Friday as one of the biggest Euromillions jackpots ever was up for grabs - but no-one took home the big prize. This means tonight it must be won .

As always, we'll bring you the results below as soon as the draw is made. Stick with us to get the winning numbers live and in real time, before anyone else. Scroll down to see them as they come in.

This means that even if you don't match five numbers plus the lucky stars, you could win.

All the rules and why this is the case have been explained by the Mirror's money editor James Andrews - in case you wanted to read up on it.

But for now let's gear up to a National Lottery draw which is guaranteed to be life-changing for some lucky punter.

And not forgetting - there is also the Thunderball draw tonight. This gives you the chance to win £500,000.

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

The Thunderball draw will take place at 8.15pm as it always does. While the Euromillions results normally come out at around 8.20pm.

You can grab tickets for both draws up to 7.30pm.

In case you missed it - the winning numbers in Friday's Euromillions draw were 6, 9, 35, 41, 44 and the lucky stars were 6, 9.

Demand was so high that the Euromillons app crashed so players are recommended to get their tickets nice and early.

A lucky Irish punter scooped a staggering €2.5 million in Friday’s EuroMillions draw.

One Irish player matched all five numbers and one lucky star to take home the mammoth prize of €2,521,015.

Every EuroMillions ticket sold helps contribute to the more than £30m raised every week for Good Causes by The National Lottery.

Anyway - on with tonight's draw. Follow our live coverage below to get all the results as soon they come in.

Get those tickets to hand - and good luck!
description: Tonight's massive £169million Euromillions jackpot must be won in the pan-European Lotto draw  - make sure to grab your ticket
